You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC.

Effect: Align Armament (Chaotic).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xtXWw3cUnVB25XSV]{Sanctify Armament}.

For 1 round, that weapon deals an additional 1d6 spirit damage.

Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xtXWw3cUnVB25XSV]{Sanctify Armament}.

For 1 round, that weapon deals an additional 1d6 spirit damage.

For 1 round, that weapon deals an additional 1d6 spirit damage.

Effect: Ancestral Influence.name: Effect: Ancestral Influence
Effect: Ancestral Influence.description:
One of your ancestors becomes predominant in their meddling. The first time you gain this effect each day, roll [[/r 1d4]] on the list below to determine which type of ancestor becomes predominant. During combat or another tense, round-by-round encounter, other ancestors wrestle for control of your actions. When you roll initiative, and then at the end of each of your turns during the encounter, roll [[/r 1d4]] and change your predominant ancestor appropriately. Once the encounter ends, you return to the influence of the ancestor you first rolled for the day.

Ancestral Influence

  1. Martial Ancestor
    • Preferred action Strikes
    • Moderate curse benefit Your Strikes gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and a +2 status bonus to damage.
    • Major curse benefit Your Strikes gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and a +6 status bonus to damage
  2. Skillful Ancestor
    • Preferred action Perception and Skill actions
    • Moderate curse benefit You gain a +1 status bonus to skill checks and Perception checks.
    • Major curse benefit You gain a +2 status bonus to skill checks and Perception checks.
  3. Spellcasting Ancestor
    • Preferred action Cast a Spell
    • Moderate curse benefit Non-cantrip spells without a duration gain a status bonus to their damage and healing equal to the spell's rank.
    • Major curse benefit Non-cantrip spells without a duration gain a status bonus to their damage and healing equal to the spell's rank + 3.
  4. You choose which ancestor guides your actions

Effect: Aquatic Endemic Herbs.name: Effect: Aquatic Endemic Herbs
Effect: Aquatic Endemic Herbs.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.BQzExsEZrwGsJD66]{Endemic Herbs}

Gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Fortitude saves.

Effect: Arctic Endemic Herb.name: Effect: Arctic Endemic Herb
Effect: Arctic Endemic Herb.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.BQzExsEZrwGsJD66]{Endemic Herbs}

For 1 hour, treat environmental cold effects as if they were one step less severe.

Effect: Armor Tampered With (Critical Su.name: Effect: Armor Tampered With (Critical Success)
Effect: Armor Tampered With (Critical Su.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.SheifYobjKqyK3Fv]{Tamper}

Your armor has been tampered with! You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} and take a -10-foot penalty to your Speeds. The effect lasts until you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} to remove it.

Effect: Armor Tampered With (Success).name: Effect: Armor Tampered With (Success)
Effect: Armor Tampered With (Success).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.SheifYobjKqyK3Fv]{Tamper}

Your armor has been tampered with! You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} and take a -10-foot penalty to your Speeds. The effect ends at the start of the inventor's next turn, or until you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} to remove it.

Effect: Assisting Shot.name: Effect: Assisting Shot
Effect: Assisting Shot.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.UiQbjeqBUFjUtgUR]{Assisting Shot} if you hit the target.

The next creature other than you to attack the same target before the start of your next turn gains a +1 circumstance bonus on their roll.

Effect: Assisting Shot (Critical Hit).name: Effect: Assisting Shot (Critical Hit)
Effect: Assisting Shot (Critical Hit).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.UiQbjeqBUFjUtgUR]{Assisting Shot} if you critically hit the target.

The next creature other than you to attack the same target before the start of your next turn gains a +2 circumstance bonus on their roll.

Effect: Augment Senses.name: Effect: Augment Senses
Effect: Augment Senses.description: Until the start of your next turn, you can't be flanked.

Effect: Aura of Preservation.name: Effect: Aura of Preservation
Effect: Aura of Preservation.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.z7kwVNaCB4oJs3Fe]{Aura of Determination}

Your allies within 15 feet gain a +1 status bonus to Fortitude and Will saves against effects from aberrations.

Effect: Avenge in Glory.name: Effect: Avenge in Glory
Effect: Avenge in Glory.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.gKDRnsBPBdhJB0FI]{Avenge in Glory}

Frequency once per day

Access mountain dwarf ethnicity

Trigger An ally within 30 feet gains the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{Dying} condition.

You honor your ally's life, gaining temporary Hit Points equal to your level for 1 minute. As long as you have these temporary Hit Points, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to attack and damage rolls.

Implemented Effects:

  • Temporary hitpoints based on level
  • Sets a circumstance bonus of +1 to attack and damage rolls

0.label: Azarketi Purification (vs. ongoing saves against poisons already in your body)

Effect: Battle Medicine Immunity.name: Effect: Battle Medicine Immunity
Effect: Battle Medicine Immunity.description: Granted when someone uses @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.wYerMk6F1RZb0Fwt]{Battle Medicine} on you, rendering you temporarily immune to Battle Medicine from that person for the duration.

Effect: Bespell Strikes.name: Effect: Bespell Strikes
Effect: Bespell Strikes.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.tWBK7Zbt80JlPryC]{Bespell Strikes}

The weapon or unarmed attack deals an extra 1d6 force damage and gains the arcane trait if it didn't have it already. If the spell dealt a different type of damage, the Strike deals this type of damage instead.

Effect: Bespell Weapon.name: Effect: Bespell Weapon
Effect: Bespell Weapon.description:
Granted by Bespell Weapon if you cast a conjuration or transmution spell.

Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an additional 1d6 damage.

Effect: Bespell Weapon (Force).name: Effect: Bespell Weapon (Force)
Effect: Bespell Weapon (Force).description:
Granted by Bespell Weapon if you cast an abjuration spell or an evocation spell that didn't deal damage.

Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an additional 1d6 force damage.

Effect: Bespell Weapon (Mental).name: Effect: Bespell Weapon (Mental)
Effect: Bespell Weapon (Mental).description:
Granted by Bespell Weapon if you cast a divination, enchantment or illusion spell.

Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an additional 1d6 mental damage.

Effect: Bespell Weapon (Void).name: Effect: Bespell Weapon (Void)
Effect: Bespell Weapon (Void).description:
Granted by Bespell Weapon if you cast a necromancy spell.

Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an additional 1d6 void damage.

Effect: Bon Mot.name: Effect: Bon Mot
Effect: Bon Mot.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.0GF2j54roPFIDmXf]{Bon Mot}

You are distracted and take a -2 status penalty to Perception and Will saves for 1 minute.

You can end the effect early with a retort to your Bon Mot. This can either be a single action that has the concentrate trait or an appropriate skill action to frame their retort. The GM determines which skill actions qualify, though they must take at least 1 action. Typically, the retort needs to use a linguistic Charisma-based skill action.

Effect: Bon Mot (Critical Success).name: Effect: Bon Mot (Critical Success)
Effect: Bon Mot (Critical Success).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.0GF2j54roPFIDmXf]{Bon Mot}

You are distracted and take a -3 status penalty to Perception and Will saves for 1 minute.

You can end the effect early with a retort to your Bon Mot. This can either be a single action that has the concentrate trait or an appropriate skill action to frame their retort. The GM determines which skill actions qualify, though they must take at least 1 action. Typically, the retort needs to use a linguistic Charisma-based skill action.

Effect: Brightness Seeker.name: Effect: Brightness Seeker
Effect: Brightness Seeker.description:
Trigger You attempt an attack roll, skill check, or saving throw while performing the course of action from your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.41TZEjhO6D1nWw2X]{Augury}, but you haven't rolled yet.

Effect You gain a +1 status bonus to the triggering check, or a +2 status bonus if the result of the augury was woe and you proceeded anyway.

Effect: Cast Down.name: Effect: Cast Down
Effect: Cast Down.description: You take a –10-foot status penalty to your Speed.

Effect: Castigating Weapon.name: Effect: Castigating Weapon
Effect: Castigating Weapon.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.tSmd0cxq9wokSCh4]{Castigating Weapon}

Your weapon or unarmed Strikes gain your holy or unholy trait and deal additional spirit damage.

Effect: Catfolk Dance.name: Effect: Catfolk Dance
Effect: Catfolk Dance.description: The target creature gains a -2 circumstance penalty to Reflex saves

Effect: Cavalier's Banner.name: Effect: Cavalier's Banner
Effect: Cavalier's Banner.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.CAaXGhHDMRM3Pt4J]{Cavalier's Banner}

You fly the banner of your pledge from your mount, raising your allies' spirits. You and all allies within 30 feet gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Will saves and DCs against fear effects. If your banner is destroyed or removed, allies within 30 feet become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Effect: Champion's Resistance.name: Effect: Champion's Resistance
Effect: Champion's Resistance.description: The ally gains resistance to all damage against the triggering damage equal to 2 + your level.

Effect: Channeling Block.name: Effect: Channeling Block
Effect: Channeling Block.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.75Y1Lk9JE3q1vDA2]{Channeling Block}

Roll 1d8 for each rank of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{Harm} spell, and increase the shield's Hardness by the total for this block.

Effect: Clue In.name: Effect: Clue In
Effect: Clue In.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.25WDi1cVUrW92sUj]{Clue In}

Whenever you attempt a Perception or skill check to investigate a designated subject, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to the check.

Effect: Combat Mentor Boon (PFS).name: Effect: Combat Mentor Boon (PFS)
Effect: Combat Mentor Boon (PFS).description:
Effect While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you provide pointers and lead drills that ensure your newer colleagues' attacks strike true. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase the Level Bump's modifier to attack rolls and spell attack rolls to 2.

Normal A Level Bump increases a PC's attack roll and spell attack roll modifiers by 1.

Special A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

Effect: Command Attention.name: Effect: Command Attention
Effect: Command Attention.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.N0gJ4Q69nslbdXHg]{Command Attention}

When creatures within 30 feet of you attempt saving throws against other visual effects, they use the outcome for one degree of success better than the result they rolled.

Effect: Continuous Flair.name: Effect: Continuous Flair
Effect: Continuous Flair.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.13QpCrR8a8XULbJa]{Continuous Flair}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to further checks for actions that would grant you panache in combat.

Effect: Control Tower.name: Effect: Control Tower
Effect: Control Tower.description: Your keen senses and ability to process battlefield information have dramatically improved, allowing you to drastically reduce the advantage of unseen foes. You and allies in your overwatch field gain a +2 circumstance bonus when using the Seek action to find hidden or undetected creatures within the overwatch field. You and your allies don't have to succeed at a flat check to target a concealed creature within your overwatch field. When you or an ally targets a hidden creature in your overwatch field, reduce the DC of the flat check to 5.

0.label: Seeking a Hidden or Undetected Target

Effect: Core Cannon.name: Effect: Core Cannon
Effect: Core Cannon.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.zeyrLJr6b7hPdx4w]{Core Cannon}

Your body transforms into a powerful magical cannon.

Effect: Current Spell.name: Effect: Current Spell
Effect: Current Spell.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ajesR7y0jWzqjAgc]{Current Spell} if you cast a spell with the air trait.

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC or a +2 circumstance bonus against ranged attacks. You also gain a +1 circumstance bonus to all saves against effects with the selected trait.

This effect has the selected trait.

Effect: Current Spell (Air).name: Effect: Current Spell (Air)
Effect: Current Spell (Air).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ajesR7y0jWzqjAgc]{Current Spell} if you cast a spell with the air trait.

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC or a +2 circumstance bonus against ranged attacks. You also gain a +1 circumstance bonus to all saves against effects with the air trait.

This effect has the air trait.

Effect: Current Spell (Water).name: Effect: Current Spell (Water)
Effect: Current Spell (Water).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ajesR7y0jWzqjAgc]{Current Spell} if you cast a spell with the water trait.

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC or a +2 circumstance bonus against ranged attacks. You also gain a +1 circumstance bonus to all saves against effects with the water trait.

This effect has the water trait.

Effect: Curse of Ancestral Meddling.name: Effect: Curse of Ancestral Meddling
Effect: Curse of Ancestral Meddling.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.qvRlih3u7vK3FYUR]{Ancestors}

Curse of Ancestral Meddling

The ancestral spirits you commune with haunt you and meddle with your belongings and actions, either out of a well-intentioned (but ultimately detrimental) attempt to assist you, as punishment for your audacity in circumventing the traditional means of achieving divine power, for their own amusement, or a mixture of the above. Your hair, clothing, and belongings constantly shift and stir, seemingly of their own volition.

Minor Curse

One of your ancestors becomes predominant in their meddling. The first time you gain this effect each day, roll [[/r 1d4]] on the list below to determine which type of ancestor becomes predominant. This predominant ancestor guides you to use their preferred type of action. When you try to use one of the types of actions listed for the other ancestors, you must succeed at a @Check[flat|dc:4]. On a failure, you spend the action but gain no effect (though you don't lose the spell if you were Casting a Spell). If your action would take 1 minute or longer, it's long enough that you can overcome the meddling, and you don't need to attempt a flat check.

During combat or another tense, round-by-round encounter, other ancestors wrestle for control of your actions. When you roll initiative, and then at the end of each of your turns during the encounter, roll [[/r 1d4]] and change your predominant ancestor appropriately. Once the encounter ends, you return to the influence of the ancestor you first rolled for the day.

Moderate Curse

The flat check DC to use other actions is 6, and you get the moderate curse benefit listed for your predominant ancestor in the list below.

Major Curse (11th)

The flat check DC is 8, and you get the major curse benefit listed for your predominant ancestor instead of the moderate curse benefit.

Ancestral Influence

  1. Martial Ancestor
    • Preferred action Strikes
    • Moderate curse benefit Your Strikes gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and a +2 status bonus to damage.
    • Major curse benefit Your Strikes gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and a +6 status bonus to damage
  2. Skillful Ancestor
    • Preferred action Perception and Skill actions
    • Moderate curse benefit You gain a +1 status bonus to skill checks and Perception checks.
    • Major curse benefit You gain a +2 status bonus to skill checks and Perception checks.
  3. Spellcasting Ancestor
    • Preferred action Cast a Spell
    • Moderate curse benefit Non-cantrip spells without a duration gain a status bonus to their damage and healing equal to the spell's rank.
    • Major curse benefit Non-cantrip spells without a duration gain a status bonus to their damage and healing equal to the spell's rank + 3.
  4. You choose which ancestor guides your actions

Effect: Curse of Engulfing Flames.name: Effect: Curse of Engulfing Flames
Effect: Curse of Engulfing Flames.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.GTSvbFb36InvuH0w]{Flames}

Curse of Engulfing Flames

You see flames and smoke wherever you look. These flames might be imagined, or they might be a preternatural glimpse of the metaphorical fires that empower the entire multiverse-but you always see them. Fires flare noticeably (though not dangerously) in your presence, you occasionally smoke slightly, and your body is almost painfully hot to the touch.

Minor Curse

The smoke, heat, and crackling flames of your curse fill your vision and all your other senses.

Creatures further than 30 feet are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} from you. You can't benefit from effects that would allow you to ignore or mitigate this concealment, as normal for effects of an oracular curse.

Moderate Curse

Smoke and flickering visions of flame fill your senses more completely, and harmless flickers of obscuring flames also fill your space.

You are concealed from other creatures, though as the other creatures aren't cursed themselves, they can benefit from effects that would allow them to ignore or mitigate the concealed condition, as normal. All other creatures and objects are concealed from you regardless of distance; however, when casting a fire spell, you automatically succeed at the flat check for this concealed condition for targets within 30 feet.

All your senses become imprecise beyond 30 feet, meaning everything past 30 feet that you'd normally be able to see is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} from you.

Major Curse (11th)

The flames surrounding you are no longer simply visions.

An aura of fire surrounds you in a 10-foot emanation, dealing @Damage[4d6[fire]] damage (basic Reflex save) to all other creatures in the aura at the end of each of your turns. You lose [[/r 1d6]] Hit Points at the end of your turn each round, with no save; if you have a weakness to fire, increase the number of HP you lose by that weakness.

You can suppress your aura until the start of your next turn by spending a single action, which has the concentrate trait, to diminish the flames, causing neither you nor anyone in the aura to take damage. While Refocusing to reduce your curse, you are continually diminishing the flames, so you don't lose HP. The flames subside if you fall @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious}, but they resume when you wake up unless you rested for long enough to reset your curse. As usual for oracular curses, you can't mitigate or reduce the lost Hit Points in any way, though you can still heal the lost HP normally after the fact.

Effect: Curse of Living Death.name: Effect: Curse of Living Death
Effect: Curse of Living Death.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.IaxmCkdsPlA52spu]{Bones}

Curse of Living Death

Your body is slowly decaying even though you are alive, and using your powers furthers this unnatural living death. You carry a touch of the grave about you, manifesting as bloodless pallor, a faint smell of earth, or deathly cold skin.

Minor Curse

Bones protrude through your skin and your flesh rots, combining with a stench of decay and an unearthly chill. Non-magical effects that would restore your Hit Points only grant you half as many HP as normal.

Moderate Curse

Your dead flesh continues to rot, affecting your health. You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1}, and this drained condition is cumulative with any other drained conditions you gain. This drained condition is removed only when you Refocus; effects that normally remove the drained condition reduce your drained condition to drained 1 instead.

In addition, you gain resistance to poison equal to half your level. You gain a +4 status bonus to saves against diseases, poisons, and death effects, and if you roll a success on such a save, you get a critical success instead.

Major Curse (11th)

You stand just steps from the grave. You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{Wounded 1}. This wounded condition is removed only when you Refocus; effects that normally remove the wounded condition reduce your wounded condition to wounded 1 instead.

When you would attempt a recovery check, you can choose to get an automatic success instead of rolling, and if you roll a critical failure on a save against a disease, poison, or death effect, you get a failure instead.

Effect: Curse of Outpouring Life.name: Effect: Curse of Outpouring Life
Effect: Curse of Outpouring Life.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.o1gGG36wpn9mxeop]{Life}

Curse of Outpouring Life

Life energy flows outward from you and connects you to all living things, but you expend your vital essence to do so. Your presence comforts the ill and injured, causes scars to fade slightly, spurs new growth in plants, and otherwise infuses your surroundings with vitality.

Minor Curse

As your life force seeps outward, it becomes more difficult to keep your body functioning. Effects that restore Hit Points to you take a status penalty equal to half your level (minimum 1) to the number of HP you recover.

Moderate Curse

The flow of life energy away from you can't be reversed.

In addition to the effects of your minor curse, you can't be healed by magical effects originating from other creatures. However, if you are unconscious, magical effects can restore you to 1 HP (but no higher). You are affected normally by healing elixirs, potions, and other items.

When you cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} and all your targets are living creatures, you roll d12s instead of d8s for the amount of healing.

Whenever you finish casting a non-cantrip spell, you restore Hit Points equal to the spell rank to your choice of either one target of the spell or the creature nearest to you. You can't heal yourself in this way. This healing has the healing, necromancy, and vitality traits, as well as the tradition trait of the spell.

Major Curse (11th)

Life energy tears through you to empower your magic. Some of your spells carry vitality energy with them.

Each time you use a spell slot to cast a 5th-rank or higher spell that takes 2 or more actions to cast, you disperse vitality energy in a @Template[burst|distance:30] with the effects of a 3-action @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} spell with a level 4 lower than that of the spell you cast. This healing occurs immediately after you finish Casting the Spell. You don't benefit from this healing. Instead, you lose double the number of Hit Points rolled for the heal spell.

Effect: Curse of Torrential Knowledge.name: Effect: Curse of Torrential Knowledge
Effect: Curse of Torrential Knowledge.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.tZBb3Kh4nJcNoUFI]{Lore}

Curse of Torrential Knowledge

You have a link to true divine knowledge, but your mortal mind struggles to process and act on what you know. Loose materials around you, such as dust, grains of rice, and droplets of water, slowly shift to form strange runes or faint indecipherable writing, and you sometimes speak unintelligible truths or statements in unknown languages without realizing it.

Minor Curse

You take a -4 penalty to initiative, as trying to process a surge of information about what's happening around you slows your ability to respond to it.

Moderate Curse

The flow of information through your mind grows. The attention you divert to process this huge influx of information means you are always @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard}.

At the start of each of your turns, you automatically make one check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{Recall Knowledge} as a free action. This uses a skill of your choice that has the Recall Knowledge action, using a result equal to 10 + your proficiency bonus in that skill (with no other bonuses, penalties, or modifiers).

Major Curse (11th)

The massive flow of information clouding your mind overwhelms your ability to communicate with others. You can understand all languages, but you can't speak, use linguistic effects, or otherwise communicate with your allies.

If you Cast a Spell with a verbal component, you must succeed at a @Check[flat|dc:5] or the spell is lost.

You gain a +4 status bonus on saving throws against linguistic effects.

Effect: Curse of the Hero's Burden.name: Effect: Curse of the Hero's Burden
Effect: Curse of the Hero's Burden.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.gjOGOR30Czpnx3tM]{Battle}

Curse of the Hero's Burden

You thrive while adrenaline flows and your life depends on your might alone, but holding the collective battle prowess of the ages within you leaves your body weakened after a fight. You smell faintly of steel and blood no matter how you try to remove or mask the scent, you appear more muscular than you actually are, and you hear the faint clash and clamor of battle in the distance at all times.

Minor Curse

Your body languishes when you aren't bringing harm to your foes. You take a -2 status penalty to AC and saving throws, but each time you make a Strike, you can suspend these penalties until the start of your next turn.

Moderate Curse

The strain of conflict wears upon your body, even though you gain vitality from it. Making a Strike reduces the penalty from your minor curse to -1 rather than suspending it entirely. You gain a +2 status bonus to weapon and unarmed damage rolls. You also gain fast healing equal to half your level while in a non-trivial combat encounter.

Major Curse (11th)

Your body proves capable of truly heroic feats, but doing so interferes with your mental focus. Your moderate curse's fast healing is equal to your level, and its damage bonus is +6. You gain a +1 status bonus to weapon and unarmed attack rolls, but you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2}.

Effect: Curse of the Perpetual Storm.name: Effect: Curse of the Perpetual Storm
Effect: Curse of the Perpetual Storm.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.W9cF7wZztLDb1WGY]{Tempest}

Curse of the Perpetual Storm

You are the center of your own tiny tempest, ever surrounded by wind and rain that worsens the more you tap into your elemental powers. Even when you are calm and at rest, your hair and clothing are blown about by gentle winds, you are slightly damp, and your touch often comes with a static shock.

Minor Curse

An aura of a whirling storm whips up in a @Template[emanation|distance:5] around you and in your space. The aura puts out small non-magical fires 1 round after they're lit or brought into your aura.

Electrical energy builds up within your storm, turning you into a lightning rod; you gain weakness 2 to electricity, and electricity spells or effects that have additional effects for a creature wearing or holding metal treat you as though you were wearing metal.

Moderate Curse

Your minor curse's aura expands to a @Template[emanation|distance:10] and carries rain on the winds. The whirling winds impose a -2 circumstance penalty on ranged attack rolls using physical ammunition that target you or originate from you.

Your weakness to electricity increases to 5 or half your level, whichever is greater, but torrential rain grants you an equal amount of fire resistance.

Major Curse (11th)

Your minor curse's aura expands to a @Template[emanation|distance:15] and grows stronger. High winds blowing outward in the aura impede creatures' progress. The aura is difficult terrain for Large and smaller creatures on the ground, and for Huge or smaller flying creatures. You aren't affected by this difficult terrain.

The electricity arcing through you becomes dangerous. Any creature that touches you or damages you with an unarmed melee attack or non-reach melee weapon takes @Damage[1d6[electricity]] damage. As normal, this doesn't affect creatures you touch.

Effect: Curse of the Sky's Call.name: Effect: Curse of the Sky's Call
Effect: Curse of the Sky's Call.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.RI2EMRBBPNSoTJXu]{Cosmos}

Curse of the Sky's Call

You have your head in the clouds-and not just figuratively. Your body is drawn toward the heavens, making you lighter and less substantial than you should be. Your eyes glow with starry light, and your hair and clothing float and drift around you.

Minor Curse

Your unnatural lightness makes it hard to keep your footing and interact with other physical objects. You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} and take a -2 penalty to saves and DCs against @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove}, and other forms of forced movement.

Moderate Curse

Your body is drawn further skyward. You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2}, and the penalty from your minor curse increases to -3.

You are treated as one size smaller for wind effects. You gain a +2 status bonus against @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip} attempts, you only take half as much damage from falls, and you gain the effects of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.HJYQlmGTdtyGWr6a]{Powerful Leap} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ZBhvJ9O8MvBFAlhq]{Quick Jump} skill feats. You weigh only half as much, and your Bulk, should someone need to carry you, is also half as much.

Major Curse (11th)

As your body rises, you float just above the ground beneath you. You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 4}, and the penalty from your minor curse increases to -4.

You can walk on liquids as if they were solid; you gain the effects of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.TVFfTP9fHRidwBlW]{Cloud Jump} skill feat; and you don't leave tracks, trigger weight-sensitive pressure plates, or otherwise connect with the ground below you.

Effect: Cut from the Air.name: Effect: Cut from the Air
Effect: Cut from the Air.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.6xBu4BewIkOIt9M0]{Cut from the Air}.

You gain a +4 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.

Effect: Debilitating Strike.name: Effect: Debilitating Strike
Effect: Debilitating Strike.description:
The target has been affected by a rogue's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.bp0Up04x3dzGK5bB]{Debilitating Strike}.

Note: this effect only tracks the duration of the debilitation. You need to manually apply the specific penalties the rogue chose to apply.

Effect: Deep Freeze.name: Effect: Deep Freeze
Effect: Deep Freeze.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.jNzjecRGyyAqkkrm]{Deep Freeze}.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target takes half damage and takes a -5-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 round.

Failure The target takes full damage and takes a -10-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 round.

Critical Failure The target takes double damage, is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 round, and takes a -15-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 round.

Effect: Defensive Recovery.name: Effect: Defensive Recovery
Effect: Defensive Recovery.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.d1ktdX1Fk37dG5ms]{Defensive Recovery}

You gain a +2 status bonus to AC and saving throws.

Effect: Deity's Protection.name: Effect: Deity's Protection
Effect: Deity's Protection.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.DUb1VWSbTjdsbAkQ]{Deity's Protection}

You gain resistance to all damage until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Demonic Blood Magic (Target).name: Effect: Demonic Blood Magic (Target)
Effect: Demonic Blood Magic (Target).description: The corruption of sin weakens a target's defenses. A target takes a -1 status penalty to AC for 1 round.

Effect: Desert Endemic Herbs.name: Effect: Desert Endemic Herbs
Effect: Desert Endemic Herbs.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.BQzExsEZrwGsJD66]{Endemic Herbs}

For 1 hour, treat environmental heat effects as if they were one step less severe.

Effect: Didactic Strike.name: Effect: Didactic Strike
Effect: Didactic Strike.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.6fojN9yBJByTZ1Q9]{Didactic Strike}.

Your first attack against the designated target before the investigator's next turn deals an extra 2d6 precision damage to the target if it hits.

Effect: Discordant Voice.name: Effect: Discordant Voice
Effect: Discordant Voice.description: Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.8JMOgtB3XG7o6ffW]{Discordant Voice}, while you are affected by Inspire Courage.

Effect: Distracting Feint.name: Effect: Distracting Feint
Effect: Distracting Feint.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.hLYoIjH8gPEVXyWG]{Distracting Feint}

While a creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} by your Feint, it also takes a -2 circumstance penalty to Perception checks and Reflex saves.

Effect: Divine Castigation.name: Effect: Divine Castigation
Effect: Divine Castigation.description:
Imposed by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.142QRyK2aPIrJu48]{Divine Castigation}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} spells you cast damage fiends as though they were undead.

Effect: Divine Infusion.name: Effect: Divine Infusion
Effect: Divine Infusion.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.JcXzKwrdMkNszrJQ]{Divine Infusion}

The target deals additional damage with its melee weapons and unarmed attacks until the end of its next turn. The damage type is void if you cast harm and vitality if you cast heal.

Effect: Divine Infusion (Harm).name: Effect: Divine Infusion (Harm)
Effect: Divine Infusion (Harm).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.JcXzKwrdMkNszrJQ]{Divine Infusion}

You deal an additional 1d6 void damage with your melee weapons and unarmed attacks. If the harm spell is at least 5th rank, this damage increases to 2d6, and if the harm spell is at least 8th rank, the damage increases to 3d6.

Effect: Divine Infusion (Heal).name: Effect: Divine Infusion (Heal)
Effect: Divine Infusion (Heal).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.JcXzKwrdMkNszrJQ]{Divine Infusion}

You deal 1d6 additional vitality damage with your melee weapons and unarmed attacks until the end of its next turn. If the heal spell is at least 5th rank, this damage increases to 2d6, or 3d6 if the spell is at least 8th rank.

Effect: Divine Rebuttal.name: Effect: Divine Rebuttal
Effect: Divine Rebuttal.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.iLFK11lcw5hViTBS]{Divine Rebuttal}

All your allies gain a +2 circumstance bonus to the triggering saving throw (or a +3 circumstance bonus on a critical hit).

Effect: Divine Weapon.name: Effect: Divine Weapon
Effect: Divine Weapon.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Trj5azJlaOk5jgBi]{Divine Weapon}

Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an additional 1d4 spirit damage. If you are holy or unholy, Strikes with the weapon also gain that trait, and the additional damage increases to 2d4 against creatures of the opposing trait.

Effect: Divine Weapon (Chaotic).name: Effect: Divine Weapon (Chaotic)
Effect: Divine Weapon (Chaotic).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Trj5azJlaOk5jgBi]{Divine Weapon}.

Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an additional 1d6 spirit damage.

Effect: Divine Weapon (Evil).name: Effect: Divine Weapon (Evil)
Effect: Divine Weapon (Evil).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Trj5azJlaOk5jgBi]{Divine Weapon}.

Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an additional 1d6 spirit damage.

Effect: Divine Weapon (Good).name: Effect: Divine Weapon (Good)
Effect: Divine Weapon (Good).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Trj5azJlaOk5jgBi]{Divine Weapon}.

Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an additional 1d6 spirit damage.

Effect: Divine Weapon (Lawful).name: Effect: Divine Weapon (Lawful)
Effect: Divine Weapon (Lawful).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Trj5azJlaOk5jgBi]{Divine Weapon}.

Until the end of your turn, the weapon deals an additional 1d6 spirit damage.

Effect: Divine Wings.name: Effect: Divine Wings
Effect: Divine Wings.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.vtCrMziYxNyj8kP7]{Divine Wings}

You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed.

Effect: Draconic Blood Magic.name: Effect: Draconic Blood Magic
Effect: Draconic Blood Magic.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.ZHabYxSgYK0XbjhM]{Bloodline: Draconic}

Draconic scales grow briefly on you or one target, granting a +1 status bonus to AC for 1 round.

Effect: Draw From the Land.name: Effect: Draw From the Land
Effect: Draw From the Land.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.HlqAdfxmcd9gdgHa]{Draw From the Land}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level.

Effect: Duelist's Challenge.name: Effect: Duelist's Challenge
Effect: Duelist's Challenge.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.5op3m0gwZjL4udit]{Duelist's Challenge}.

Select one foe that you can see and proclaim a challenge. That foe is your dueling opponent until they are defeated, flee, or the encounter ends.

Any time you hit that enemy using a single one-handed melee weapon while your other hand or hands are free, you gain a circumstance bonus to the Strike's damage equal to the number of damage dice your weapon deals.

If you attack a creature other than your dueling opponent, you take a circumstance penalty to damage equal to the number of damage dice your weapon deals.

Effect: Echoes in Stone.name: Effect: Echoes in Stone
Effect: Echoes in Stone.description: You gain imprecise tremorsense with a range of 20 feet.

Effect: Educate Allies.name: Effect: Educate Allies
Effect: Educate Allies.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.9cHQua33V35JPE3U]{Educate Allies}.

All allies affected by your composition spell gain your +1 circumstance bonus from @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.iX5HEqRImhKzfPR2]{Well-Versed} until the start of your next turn. Your personal circumstance bonus from Well-Versed also increases to +2 until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Educate Allies (Self).name: Effect: Educate Allies (Self)
Effect: Educate Allies (Self).description: Granted by using @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.9cHQua33V35JPE3U]{Educate Allies} on your allies.

Effect: Elemental Assault.name: Effect: Elemental Assault
Effect: Elemental Assault.description: You shroud your arms and held weapons in elemental magic. Choose one element. Until the end of your next turn, your Strikes deal an additional 1d6 damage of the indicated type and have the trait corresponding to the element: electricity for air, bludgeoning for earth, fire for fire, or cold for water.

Effect: Elemental Blood Magic (Self).name: Effect: Elemental Blood Magic (Self)
Effect: Elemental Blood Magic (Self).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.RXRnJcG4XSabZ35a]{Bloodline: Elemental}

You gain a +2 status bonus to Intimidation checks.

Effect: Elementalist Dedication.name: Effect: Elementalist Dedication
Effect: Elementalist Dedication.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.tx9pkrpmtqe4FnvS]{Elementalist Dedication}

Each day when you make your daily preparations, you can attune yourself to one element of your choice from your elemental philosophy. You gain resistance equal to half your level (minimum 1 resistance) against damage dealt by effects with your attuned elemental trait. This attunement lasts until you next make your daily preparations.

Effect: Emblazon Antimagic.name: Effect: Emblazon Antimagic
Effect: Emblazon Antimagic.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xAFdoKl7aOP9rVkl]{Emblazon Antimagic}

  • Shield When the wielder has the shield raised, they gain the shield's circumstance bonus to saving throws against magic.
  • Weapon When the weapon's wielder critically hits with the weapon, they can attempt to counteract a spell on their target, using half their level, rounded up, as the counteract rank.

Effect: Emblazon Armament.name: Effect: Emblazon Armament
Effect: Emblazon Armament.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.7RFjTTzznsdPcaYB]{Emblazon Armament}

  • Shield The shield gains a +1 status bonus to its Hardness.
  • Weapon The wielder gains a +1 status bonus to damage rolls with the weapon.

Effect: Emblazon Armament (Shield).name: Effect: Emblazon Armament (Shield)
Effect: Emblazon Armament (Shield).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.7RFjTTzznsdPcaYB]{Emblazon Armament} when applied to a shield.

  • Shield The shield gains a +1 status bonus to its Hardness.

Effect: Emblazon Armament (Weapon).name: Effect: Emblazon Armament (Weapon)
Effect: Emblazon Armament (Weapon).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.7RFjTTzznsdPcaYB]{Emblazon Armament}

The wielder gains a +1 status bonus to damage rolls with the chosen weapon

Effect: Emblazon Energy.name: Effect: Emblazon Energy
Effect: Emblazon Energy.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.rKZE8BA9IQHSSWoW]{Emblazon Energy}

  • Shield Choose acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic. The wielder gains the shield's circumstance bonus to saving throws against that damage type.
  • Weapon Choose acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic. The weapon deals an extra 1d4 damage of that type. Increase this extra damage to 1d6 if you have a domain spell with a trait matching that type.

Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Acid).name: Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Acid)
Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Acid).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.rKZE8BA9IQHSSWoW]{Emblazon Energy} when applied to a weapon.

  • Weapon The weapon deals an extra 1d4 acid damage, or an extra 1d6 acid damage if you have a domain spell with the acid trait.

Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Cold).name: Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Cold)
Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Cold).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.rKZE8BA9IQHSSWoW]{Emblazon Energy} when applied to a weapon.

  • Weapon The weapon deals an extra 1d4 cold damage, or an extra 1d6 cold damage if you have a domain spell with the cold trait.

Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Electri.name: Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Electricity)
Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Electri.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.rKZE8BA9IQHSSWoW]{Emblazon Energy} when applied to a weapon.

  • Weapon The weapon deals an extra 1d4 electricity damage, or an extra 1d6 electricity damage if you have a domain spell with the electricity trait.

Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Fire).name: Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Fire)
Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Fire).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.rKZE8BA9IQHSSWoW]{Emblazon Energy} when applied to a weapon.

  • Weapon The weapon deals an extra 1d4 fire damage, or an extra 1d6 fire damage if you have a domain spell with the fire trait.

Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Sonic).name: Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Sonic)
Effect: Emblazon Energy (Weapon, Sonic).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.rKZE8BA9IQHSSWoW]{Emblazon Energy} when applied to a weapon.

  • Weapon The weapon deals an extra 1d4 sonic damage, or an extra 1d6 sonic damage if you have a domain spell with the sonic trait.

Effect: Empathetic Plea.name: Effect: Empathetic Plea
Effect: Empathetic Plea.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.MS53Ds75BT379ZFm]{Empathetic Plea}

The creature takes a -2 circumstance penalty to damage on the triggering Strike and all its Strikes against you until the beginning of its next turn. The penalty is -4 if you're an expert in Diplomacy, -6 if you're a master, and -8 if you're legendary.

Effect: Energize Wings.name: Effect: Energize Wings
Effect: Energize Wings.description: You gain a fly Speed of 30 feet.

Effect: Energy Ablation.name: Effect: Energy Ablation
Effect: Energy Ablation.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.iS4Vc2zv7vgL5mnX]{Energy Ablation}

You gain resistance to an energy damage type of your choice equal to the spell's rank.

Effect: Energy Shot.name: Effect: Energy Shot
Effect: Energy Shot.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.TSDbyYRQwhIyY2Oq]{Energy Shot}

On your first three Strikes of this encounter with a firearm or crossbow, you deal an additional 1 acid, cold, fire or electricity damage. You choose which damage type to deal as part of making each Strike.

Effect: Enforce Oath.name: Effect: Enforce Oath
Effect: Enforce Oath.description:
Granted by Enforce Oath

You gain a +1 status bonus to AC and saves against attacks and effects by the chosen creature. You also gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls against the chosen creature.

However, your dedication to Enforcing your Oath draws your focus away from all other foes. While you are Enforcing your Oath, you take a -1 status penalty to AC, attack rolls, and saves against all other creatures until you stop Enforcing your Oath.

You stop Enforcing your Oath once the chosen creature is reduced to 0 Hit Points or offers a legitimate surrender to you or your allies. You immediately stop Enforcing your Oath if you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious} or if the chosen creature goes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9evPzg9E6muFcoSk]{Unnoticed} by you for more than 1 minute. You can also stop Enforcing your Oath at any time during your turn as a free action.

0.label: Target is subject of your Enforce Oath

Effect: Engine of Destruction.name: Effect: Engine of Destruction
Effect: Engine of Destruction.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.GLHh9MWlcINLC6Q0]{Engine of Destruction}

Your construct innovation gains a +2 circumstance bonus to its attack rolls.

Effect: Enlightened Presence.name: Effect: Enlightened Presence
Effect: Enlightened Presence.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ROnjdPMvH0vkkWjQ]{Enlightened Presence}.

You and allies within 15 feet of you gain a +2 status bonus to Will saving throws against mental effects.

Effect: Eye of the Arclords.name: Effect: Eye of the Arclords
Effect: Eye of the Arclords.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.OtV7esAwza1U6Kwr]{Eye of the Arclords}.

While the eye is open, you gain the following benefits:

  • you gain the effects of the detect magic arcane innate spell from your Arcane Sense at the start of each of your turns without needing to cast the spell;
  • you gain darkvision;
  • you gain a +2 status bonus to Perception checks to Seek undetected and hidden creatures and to your Perception DC against Hide and Sneak.

1.label: Eye of the Arclords (Seek undetected & hidden creatures)

Effect: Familiar of Balanced Luck.name: Effect: Familiar of Balanced Luck
Effect: Familiar of Balanced Luck.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.familiar-abilities.Item.6ZmgkMHUGGb1mDhr]{Familiar of Balanced Luck}

When you Cast or Sustain a hex, one creature within 15 feet of your familiar gets your choice of either a +1 status bonus to its AC or a –1 status penalty to its AC until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Familiar of Keen Senses.name: Effect: Familiar of Keen Senses
Effect: Familiar of Keen Senses.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.familiar-abilities.Item.onye3PN84lmca11D]{Familiar of Keen Senses}

When you Cast or Sustain a hex, your familiar gains your choice of an imprecise scent, tremorsense, or wavesense, with a range of 60 feet until the start of your next turn, and it can immediately @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.sn2hIy1iIJX9Vpgj]{Point Out} as a free action.

Effect: Familiar of Restored Spirit.name: Effect: Familiar of Restored Spirit
Effect: Familiar of Restored Spirit.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.familiar-abilities.Item.ZCze1FY3Rmnvd6Dx]{Familiar of Restored Spirit}

When you Cast or Sustain a hex, one willing creature within 15 feet of your familiar gains temporary Hit Points equal to 2 + half your level, which last until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Favorable Winds.name: Effect: Favorable Winds
Effect: Favorable Winds.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.OK8Fm7EG8wjoYZBX]{Favorable Winds}.

You wrap a shell of favorable wind around a weapon you wield. On your next Strike with a ranged weapon before the start of your next turn, you don't take circumstance penalties on the attack roll due to wind. In addition, if that weapon has a range increment of 10 feet or less, increase its range increment by 10 feet for that Strike.

Effect: Favored Terrain (Gain Climb Spee.name: Effect: Favored Terrain (Gain Climb Speed)
Effect: Favored Terrain (Gain Climb Spee.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.sgo7J9BVofBqwlsF]{Favored Terrain (Forest, Moutain or Underground)} if you have the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.RlwE99yKnhq8FUuy]{Wild Stride} class feature, and are in forested, mountainous or underground terrain and do not already have a climb Speed.

You gain a climb Speed equal to your Speed.

Effect: Favored Terrain (Gain Swim Speed.name: Effect: Favored Terrain (Gain Swim Speed)
Effect: Favored Terrain (Gain Swim Speed.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.sgo7J9BVofBqwlsF]{Favored Terrain (Aquatic)} if you have the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.RlwE99yKnhq8FUuy]{Wild Stride} class feature, and are in aquatic terrain and do not already have a swim Speed.

You gain a swim Speed equal to your Speed.

Effect: Favored Terrain (Increase Climb.name: Effect: Favored Terrain (Increase Climb Speed)
Effect: Favored Terrain (Increase Climb.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.sgo7J9BVofBqwlsF]{Favored Terrain (Forest, Moutain or Underground)} if you have the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.RlwE99yKnhq8FUuy]{Wild Stride} class feature, and are in forested, mountainous or underground terrain and already have a climb Speed.

You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your climb Speed.

Effect: Favored Terrain (Increase Swim S.name: Effect: Favored Terrain (Increase Swim Speed)
Effect: Favored Terrain (Increase Swim S.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.sgo7J9BVofBqwlsF]{Favored Terrain (Aquatic)} if you have the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.RlwE99yKnhq8FUuy]{Wild Stride} class feature, and are in aquatic terrain and already have a swimSpeed.

You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your swim Speed.

Effect: Fiendish Wings.name: Effect: Fiendish Wings
Effect: Fiendish Wings.description: You can strain to call forth bat-like or otherwise fiendish wings from your back, similar in appearance to those of your fiendish ancestors. Once manifested, these wings remain for 10 minutes. You gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed while you've manifested your wings.

Effect: Forcible Energy.name: Effect: Forcible Energy
Effect: Forcible Energy.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.UJafwv306v75Syy7]{Forcible Energy}

The target gains weakness 5 to acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic damage.

Effect: Forest Endemic Herbs.name: Effect: Forest Endemic Herbs
Effect: Forest Endemic Herbs.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.BQzExsEZrwGsJD66]{Endemic Herbs}

Gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saves against disease and poison effects.

Effect: Formation Training.name: Effect: Formation Training
Effect: Formation Training.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.aoz9dCq2NynyUYEf]{Formation Training}

You know how to fight in formation with your brethren. When you are adjacent to at least two hobgoblin allies, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC and saving throws. This bonus increases to +2 on Reflex saves against area effects.

Effect: Fortify Shield.name: Effect: Fortify Shield
Effect: Fortify Shield.description: Add your level to your shield's Hardness.

Effect: Fulminating Shot.name: Effect: Fulminating Shot
Effect: Fulminating Shot.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.o3J79hnr00ztcwtT]{Fulminating Shot}

Choose acid, cold, electricity, or fire. If you hit with your next attack roll using a firearm or crossbow before the end of your turn, you deal 1d6 additional damage of this type. At 12th level, this increases to 2d6 additional damage, and at 18th level, it increases to 3d6 additional damage.

Effect: Genie Blood Magic.name: Effect: Genie Blood Magic
Effect: Genie Blood Magic.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.tYOMBiH3HbViNWwn]{Bloodline: Genie}

Either you gain a +1 status bonus to Deception checks for 1 round, or a target takes a -1 status penalty to Perception for 1 round.

Effect: Genie Blood Magic (Target).name: Effect: Genie Blood Magic (Target)
Effect: Genie Blood Magic (Target).description: Your spellcasting warps reality and distracts your foes. A target takes a -1 status penalty to Perception for 1 round.

Effect: Goblin Song (Critical Success).name: Effect: Goblin Song (Critical Success)
Effect: Goblin Song (Critical Success).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.QZb0Utg0WFPf2Qg0]{Goblin Song}

The creature takes a -1 status penalty to Perception checks and Will saves.

Effect: Goblin Song (Success).name: Effect: Goblin Song (Success)
Effect: Goblin Song (Success).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.QZb0Utg0WFPf2Qg0]{Goblin Song}

The creature takes a -1 status penalty to Perception checks and Will saves.

Effect: Guardian's Deflection.name: Effect: Guardian's Deflection
Effect: Guardian's Deflection.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.JdCRxwgtdQkJ1Ha6]{Guardian's Deflection (Fighter)} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.YJIzE2RhGRGfbt9j]{Guardian's Deflection (Swashbuckler)}.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.

Effect: Guided by the Stars.name: Effect: Guided by the Stars
Effect: Guided by the Stars.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.s1swBWSqtfrXTJHK]{Guided by the Stars}

You roll twice and take the better result on your next skill check or saving throw. If it's night and you can see the stars, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to the triggering roll.

Effect: Gunpowder Gauntlet.name: Effect: Gunpowder Gauntlet
Effect: Gunpowder Gauntlet.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.FbzbZc4LGUTcz9tA]{Gunpowder Gauntlet}

The target takes a penalty to attack rolls against creatures other than you.

Effect: Harden Flesh.name: Effect: Harden Flesh
Effect: Harden Flesh.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.REgTwIVgI3j1FQiJ]{Harden Flesh}

You gain resistance 3 to physical damage, except adamantine, until the beginning of your next turn.

Effect: Harsh Judgement.name: Effect: Harsh Judgement
Effect: Harsh Judgement.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.37uOb0iaWCfTCvBZ]{Harsh Judgement}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks to Seek your condemned foe and on Intimidation checks to Demoralize them. You have a -1 circumstance penalty to Perception checks to Seek creatures other than your condemned foe and on Intimidation checks to Demoralize anyone other than your condemned foe.

Effect: Helpful Tinkering.name: Effect: Helpful Tinkering
Effect: Helpful Tinkering.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.qUSWPWxYF8gfhfHM]{Helpful Tinkering}

For 1 minute, the chosen ally's Strikes with the chosen weapon gain the same offensive boost your innovation has.

Effect: Heroes' Call.name: Effect: Heroes' Call
Effect: Heroes' Call.description: You gain temporary Hit Points equal to twice your level.

Effect: Heroic Recovery.name: Effect: Heroic Recovery
Effect: Heroic Recovery.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.KR78kinMmAZQHeoa]{Heroic Recovery}

You gain a +5-foot status bonus to your Speed, and a +1 status bonus to attack and damage rolls.

Effect: Hot Foot (Critical Success).name: Effect: Hot Foot (Critical Success)
Effect: Hot Foot (Critical Success).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.dtPXuS8MiWrz5UNK]{Hot Foot}

The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} and takes a -2 circumstance penalty to Reflex saves.

Effect: Hungry Goblin.name: Effect: Hungry Goblin
Effect: Hungry Goblin.description: You'll eat anything and anyone. Whenever you inflict @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage} with your jaws unarmed attack, you gain temporary Hit Points equal to half your level for 1 minute.

Effect: Hunter's Edge, Flurry.name: Effect: Hunter's Edge, Flurry
Effect: Hunter's Edge, Flurry.description:
Granted when a ranger shares their @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.6v4Rj7wWfOH1882r]{Flurry} edge with you.

Your multiple attack penalty for attacks against your hunted prey is -3 (-2 with an agile weapon) on your second attack of the turn instead of -5, and -6 (-4 with an agile weapon) on your third or subsequent attack of the turn, instead of -10.

Effect: Hunter's Edge, Outwit.name: Effect: Hunter's Edge, Outwit
Effect: Hunter's Edge, Outwit.description:
Granted when a ranger shares their @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.NBHyoTrI8q62uDsU]{Outwit} edge with you.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Deception checks, Intimidation checks, Stealth checks, and any checks to Recall Knowledge about the prey, and a +1 circumstance bonus to AC against your prey's attacks.

Effect: Hunter's Edge, Precision.name: Effect: Hunter's Edge, Precision
Effect: Hunter's Edge, Precision.description:
Granted when a ranger shares their @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.u6cBjqz2fiRBadBt]{Precision} edge with you.

You have trained to aim for your prey's weak points. The first time you hit your hunted prey in a round, you also deal 1d8 additional precision damage. (Precision damage increases the damage you already deal, using the same type, but is ineffective against creatures that lack vital organs or weak points.)

At 11th level, the extra damage increases to 2d8 precision damage, and at 19th level, the extra damage increases to 3d8 precision damage.

3.label: First attack on hunted prey this round

Effect: Hybrid Shape (Beastkin).name: Effect: Hybrid Shape (Beastkin)
Effect: Hybrid Shape (Beastkin).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.0b3TTeQGFOiy6ykz]{Change Shape}.

In hybrid shape, you appear as a mix between your ancestry and your inherent animal. While in hybrid shape, you gain a jaws unarmed Strike resembling the features of your inherent animal (fangs for bats, beaks for eagles, mandibles for wasps, and so on). Your jaws deal 1d4 piercing damage, have the agile, finesse, and unarmed traits, and are in the brawling weapon group.

Effect: Improved Poison Weapon.name: Effect: Improved Poison Weapon
Effect: Improved Poison Weapon.description: Applied when you apply a poison created with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.9Eufa07qvXG41QmG]{Improved Poison Weapon}.

Effect: Inspired Stratagem.name: Effect: Inspired Stratagem
Effect: Inspired Stratagem.description: You roll the triggering check twice and take the better of the two results.

Effect: Inventive Offensive.name: Effect: Inventive Offensive
Effect: Inventive Offensive.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.SrSYEHqOLXWuj65e]{Inventive Offensive}

When you use this ability, add one of the following weapon traits to a melee weapon you wield: deadly d6, disarm, nonlethal, shove, trip, versatile B, versatile P, or versatile S. You cannot add a trait that the weapon already has. The weapon retains this trait until you a successfully hit and deal damage with the weapon. The weapon retains this trait only while you wield it, and you can have only one weapon modified in this way at any time.

If you have legendary proficiency in Crafting, you can apply two weapon traits from the list when using this feat.

Effect: Juvenile Flight.name: Effect: Juvenile Flight
Effect: Juvenile Flight.description:
You gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed while your wings are unfurled.

If you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.UuVz1QY7QXD5cnLu]{Fledgling Flight}, you gain a +10-foot status bonus to your fly Speed with Juvenile Flight. As normal, since your fly Speed is derived from your land Speed, this status bonus isn't cumulative with a status bonus to your land Speed, if you have one.

Effect: Kneecap.name: Effect: Kneecap
Effect: Kneecap.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.1muxLx8Vacn2SLHc]{Kneecap}

The target takes a status penalty to its Speed.

Effect: Legendary Monster Hunter.name: Effect: Legendary Monster Hunter
Effect: Legendary Monster Hunter.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.YTTJqRKH8QZl6al2]{Monster Hunter} if you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Veyt4x2Kb5YcPGTv]{Legendary Monster Hunter}.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your next attack roll against that prey.

0.label: Target is the subject of Monster Hunter

Effect: Legendary Monster Warden.name: Effect: Legendary Monster Warden
Effect: Legendary Monster Warden.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.2yq3l8e2Vzz34yRV]{Monster Warden} if you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Veyt4x2Kb5YcPGTv]{Legendary Monster Hunter}.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your next attack roll against that prey.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your next saving throw against that particular creature and to your AC against that creature's next attack against you.

0.label: Target is the subject of Monster Hunter

Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Aberration).name: Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Aberration)
Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Aberration).description:
Granted by Esoteric Oath (Liberator)

If you use Liberating Step triggered by an evil aberration, your ally gains a +4 circumstance bonus to checks granted by your Liberating Step, and the ally can Step twice afterward.

Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Dragon).name: Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Dragon)
Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Dragon).description:
Granted by Dragonslayer Oath (Liberator)

If you use Liberating Step triggered by an evil dragon, your ally gains a +4 circumstance bonus to checks granted by your Liberating Step, and the ally can Step twice afterward.

Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Fiend).name: Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Fiend)
Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Fiend).description:
Granted by Fiendsbane Oath (Liberator)

If you use Liberating Step triggered by a fiend, your ally gains a +4 circumstance bonus to checks granted by your Liberating Step, and the ally can Step twice afterward.

Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Undead).name: Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Undead)
Effect: Liberating Step (vs. Undead).description:
Granted by Shining Oath (Liberator)

If you use Liberating Step triggered by an undead, your ally gains a +4 circumstance bonus to checks granted by your Liberating Step, and the ally can Step twice afterward.

Effect: Life-Giving Magic.name: Effect: Life-Giving Magic
Effect: Life-Giving Magic.description: You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to half your level (minimum 1) that last until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Living Fortification.name: Effect: Living Fortification
Effect: Living Fortification.description: You position your weapon defensively, gaining a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Living Fortification (Parry Trai.name: Effect: Living Fortification (Parry Trait)
Effect: Living Fortification (Parry Trai.description: You position your weapon defensively, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Lock On.name: Effect: Lock On
Effect: Lock On.description: The construct gains a +2 circumstance bonus to attack rolls against the designated enemy until the end of the turn. If you use 2 actions for the Command, the bonus is instead a +3 circumstance bonus, or a +4 circumstance bonus if you're legendary in Crafting.

Effect: Lost in the Crowd (10 Creatures).name: Effect: Lost in the Crowd (10 Creatures)
Effect: Lost in the Crowd (10 Creatures).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.d8RfatiK9UOQANLz]{Lost in the Crowd}

You've learned how to move as one with crowds and hide among them, vanishing into a busy street in the blink of an eye. You move at full Speed in crowds and can use cover from crowds to Hide and Sneak, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus on your Stealth checks when in a crowd of at least 10 creatures.

Effect: Lost in the Crowd (100 Creatures.name: Effect: Lost in the Crowd (100 Creatures)
Effect: Lost in the Crowd (100 Creatures.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.d8RfatiK9UOQANLz]{Lost in the Crowd}

You've learned how to move as one with crowds and hide among them, vanishing into a busy street in the blink of an eye. You move at full Speed in crowds and can use cover from crowds to Hide and Sneak, gaining a +4 circumstance bonus on your Stealth checks when in a crowd of at least 100 creatures.

Effect: Magical Mentor Boon (PFS).name: Effect: Magical Mentor Boon (PFS)
Effect: Magical Mentor Boon (PFS).description:
Effect While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you provide key spellcasting insights that augment your colleagues' magic. Any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours can prepare one additional spell of their highest-rank spell slot or cast one additional spell of their highest-rank spell slot. When casting spells of a magical tradition that is the same as the tradition you use for spellcasting, the affected PC also increases the Level Bump's modifier to spell DCs to 2.

Normal A Level Bump increases a PC's spell DCs by 1, and it does not grant any additional spells prepared or spell slots.

Special A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

**Spell-DC not implemented yet. The rule is in place for when it is but all DCs must be increased manually for now**

Effect: Maiden's Mending.name: Effect: Maiden's Mending
Effect: Maiden's Mending.description: You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to half your level (minimum 1) that last until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Marshal's Aura.name: Effect: Marshal's Aura
Effect: Marshal's Aura.description:
Granted by being inside a Marshal's Aura.

Your aura has the emotion, mental, and visual traits and grants you and allies within the aura a +1 status bonus to saving throws against fear.

Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Flurry.name: Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Flurry
Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Flurry.description:
Granted when a ranger shares their @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.JhLncIB10GSQowWL]{Masterful Hunter (Flurry)} with you.

Your multiple attack penalty for attacks against your hunted prey is -3 (-2 with an agile weapon) on your second attack of the turn instead of -5, and -6 (-4 with an agile weapon) on your third or subsequent attack of the turn, instead of -10.

Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Outwit.name: Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Outwit
Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Outwit.description:
Granted when a ranger shares their @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.vWZaLE2fEKMBw3D5]{Masterful Hunter (Outwit)} with you.

Your mastery of skills allows you to overwhelm your prey. If you have master proficiency in Deception, Intimidation, Stealth, or the skill you use to Recall Knowledge about your prey, increase the circumstance bonus against the prey with that skill from +2 to +4.

If you have master proficiency with your armor, increase the circumstance bonus to AC against the prey from +1 to +2.

3.label: Vs. attacks from hunted prey (Masterful Hunter)

7.label: Recall knowledge on hunted prey (Masterful Hunter)

8.label: Recall knowledge on hunted prey (Masterful Hunter)

9.label: Recall knowledge on hunted prey (Masterful Hunter)

10.label: Recall knowledge on hunted prey (Masterful Hunter)

11.label: Recall knowledge on hunted prey (Masterful Hunter)

12.label: Recall knowledge on hunted prey (Masterful Hunter)

Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Precisi.name: Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Precision
Effect: Masterful Hunter's Edge, Precisi.description:
Granted when a ranger shares their @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.BJYSUbFUGcTLaPDn]{Masterful Hunter (Precision)} with you.

The second time in a round you hit your hunted prey, you also deal 1d8 precision damage.

At 19th level, your second hit in a round against your hunted prey deals 2d8 precision damage, and your third hit in a round against your hunted prey deals 1d8 precision damage.

3.label: Second attack on hunted prey this round

5.label: Third attack on hunted prey this round

Effect: Methodical Debilitations (Cover).name: Effect: Methodical Debilitations (Cover)
Effect: Methodical Debilitations (Cover).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.CkK7WwaWnrLXK9sW]{Methodical Debilitations}

The target doesn't gain a circumstance bonus to AC from Raising a Shield, lesser cover, or standard cover; it gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC only from greater cover or Taking Cover.

Effect: Methodical Debilitations (Flanki.name: Effect: Methodical Debilitations (Flanking)
Effect: Methodical Debilitations (Flanki.description: The target is unable to flank or provide flanking.

Effect: Monster Hunter.name: Effect: Monster Hunter
Effect: Monster Hunter.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.YTTJqRKH8QZl6al2]{Monster Hunter}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your next attack roll against that prey.

0.label: Target is the subject of Monster Hunter

Effect: Monster Warden.name: Effect: Monster Warden
Effect: Monster Warden.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.2yq3l8e2Vzz34yRV]{Monster Warden}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your next attack roll against that prey.

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your next saving throw against that particular creature and to your AC against that creature's next attack against you.

0.label: Target is the subject of Monster Hunter

Effect: Mountain Endemic Herbs.name: Effect: Mountain Endemic Herbs
Effect: Mountain Endemic Herbs.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.BQzExsEZrwGsJD66]{Endemic Herbs}

Gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Reflex saves.

Effect: Mountain Strategy (Critically Hi.name: Effect: Mountain Strategy (Critically Hit)
Effect: Mountain Strategy (Critically Hi.description: Marks a target that critically hit you.

Effect: Mutate Weapon.name: Effect: Mutate Weapon
Effect: Mutate Weapon.description: Select one unarmed attack you gained with Living Weapon. The damage die for that attack increases by one step until the end of your turn. In addition, choose to either have the attack gain a reach of 10 feet until the end of your turn or for you to gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls with the chosen unarmed attack until the end of your turn.

Effect: Nanite Surge.name: Effect: Nanite Surge
Effect: Nanite Surge.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.JS24EjgLYcHB9E3T]{Nanite Surge}.

Your circuitry glows, lighting a @Template[emanation|distance:10] with dim light for 1 round.

Effect: Nanite Surge (Bonus).name: Effect: Nanite Surge (Bonus)
Effect: Nanite Surge (Bonus).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.JS24EjgLYcHB9E3T]{Nanite Surge}.

You gain a +2 status bonus to the triggering skill check.

Effect: Nymph Blood Magic.name: Effect: Nymph Blood Magic
Effect: Nymph Blood Magic.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.5Wxjghw7lHuCxjZz]{Bloodline: Nymph}

Nymph grace accentuates your movements and distracts your foes, either granting you a +1 status bonus to Diplomacy checks for 1 round or imposing a -1 status penalty on one target's Will saves for 1 round.

Effect: Nymph Blood Magic (Target).name: Effect: Nymph Blood Magic (Target)
Effect: Nymph Blood Magic (Target).description: Nymph grace accentuates your movements and distracts your foes, imposing a -1 status bonus to Will saves for 1 round.

Effect: Offensive Boost.name: Effect: Offensive Boost
Effect: Offensive Boost.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.F8oXHnu9iNTcpXbJ]{Offensive Boost}

Your improvements make any Strikes that rely on your innovation deal an additional 1d6 damage, with a type determined by the boost you choose. If your innovation is armor, the boost applies to your melee Strikes with one weapon you choose during daily preparations; if your innovation is a construct, the boost applies to your construct companion's Strikes.

Effect: Ongoing Selfishness.name: Effect: Ongoing Selfishness
Effect: Ongoing Selfishness.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.MRMW0EiuOO20pzG2]{Ongoing Selfishness}

You gain resistance to all further damage from the triggering enemy until the end of the turn on which you used the reaction. This resistance is equal to half your Selfish Shield resistance.

Effect: Overdrive.name: Effect: Overdrive
Effect: Overdrive.description: Your gizmos go into a state of incredible efficiency called critical overdrive, adding great power to your attacks. Your Strikes deal additional damage equal to your Intelligence modifier for 1 minute. After the Overdrive ends, your gizmos become unusable as they cool down or reset, and you can't use Overdrive for 1 minute.

Effect: Overdrive Ally.name: Effect: Overdrive Ally
Effect: Overdrive Ally.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.NBvhmNqneeok7ZOr]{Overdrive Ally}

Until the end of their next turn, that ally's Strikes deal additional damage equal to half your Intelligence modifier, or your full Intelligence modifier if you were in critical overdrive.

Effect: Overdrive Ally (Shared Overdrive.name: Effect: Overdrive Ally (Shared Overdrive)
Effect: Overdrive Ally (Shared Overdrive.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.U0XX0Mm2MbZcuNK2]{Shared Overdrive}

The first time you use Overdrive Ally during a given Overdrive, the effect lasts for the remainder of the duration of your Overdrive, instead of just until the end of the target's next turn.

Effect: Overextending Feint.name: Effect: Overextending Feint
Effect: Overextending Feint.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.9CaaU5szcf3mtJXD]{Overextending Feint}

You take a –2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls against the opponent.

Effect: Overwatch Field.name: Effect: Overwatch Field
Effect: Overwatch Field.description: Your overwatch field aura grants you increased perception and allows you to call out warnings to your allies within the aura to point out threats. This aura has the auditory and visual traits. You and allies within your overwatch field receive a +2 circumstance bonus when using Perception for Initiative checks.

Effect: Phenom Verve.name: Effect: Phenom Verve
Effect: Phenom Verve.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.4YqmeJQwnrG1Lg07]{Phenom's Verve}

You gain a +1 status bonus to your attack rolls with one-handed firearms and one-handed melee weapons.

Effect: Pistolero's Challenge.name: Effect: Pistolero's Challenge
Effect: Pistolero's Challenge.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.yOyMlFGAgLfRas8m]{Pistolero's Challenge}

Both you and the opponent gain a +2 status bonus to damage rolls with Strikes made against each other. If you're a master in the skill you used for the check, the status bonus to damage rolls increases to +3, and if you're legendary, it increases to +4.

Effect: Plains Endemic Herbs.name: Effect: Plains Endemic Herbs
Effect: Plains Endemic Herbs.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.BQzExsEZrwGsJD66]{Endemic Herbs}

Gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Will saves.

Effect: Poison Weapon.name: Effect: Poison Weapon
Effect: Poison Weapon.description: Applied when you apply a poison created with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ALbosSUygdq4T1Yk]{Poison Weapon}.

Effect: Precise Debilitations.name: Effect: Precise Debilitations
Effect: Precise Debilitations.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.wvJBIzgS298ZRp6w]{Precise Debilitations}

The target takes an additional 2d6 precision damage from your attacks.

Effect: Premonition of Clarity.name: Effect: Premonition of Clarity
Effect: Premonition of Clarity.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.2h8a6pKhXTXwpJjP]{Premonition of Clarity}

Reroll the triggering saving throw with a +2 circumstance bonus.

Effect: Primal Aegis.name: Effect: Primal Aegis
Effect: Primal Aegis.description: You gain resistance to acid, cold, electricity, fire, vitality, and void damage.

Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Admired).name: Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Admired) (PFS)
Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Admired).description:
Effect While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you shield your more fragile wards from the threat of death. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase their current and maximum Hit Points by an additional amount equal to 3 times your Radiant Oath reputation tier.

Normal A Level Bump increases a PC's Hit Points by 10% or 10, whichever is higher.

Special A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Liked) (.name: Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Liked) (PFS)
Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Liked) (.description:
Effect While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you shield your more fragile wards from the threat of death.
