For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase their current and maximum Hit Points by an additional amount equal to 3 times your Radiant Oath reputation tier.

Normal A Level Bump increases a PC's Hit Points by 10% or 10, whichever is higher.

Special A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Revered).name: Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Revered) (PFS)
Effect: Protective Mentor Boon (Revered).description:
Effect While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you shield your more fragile wards from the threat of death. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase their current and maximum Hit Points by an additional amount equal to 3 times your Radiant Oath reputation tier.

Normal A Level Bump increases a PC's Hit Points by 10% or 10, whichever is higher.

Special A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

Effect: Psychopomp Blood Magic (Self).name: Effect: Psychopomp Blood Magic (Self)
Effect: Psychopomp Blood Magic (Self).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.PpzH9tJULk5ksX9w]{Bloodline: Psychopomp}

The border between life and death becomes blurred to you. You gain a +2 status bonus to Fortitude saving throws for 1 round.

Effect: Raise Menhir.name: Effect: Raise Menhir
Effect: Raise Menhir.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.BuVIM4cV7qhVZ2WF]{Raise Menhir}

Choose arcane, divine, or occult; all creatures within 15 feet of the monument gain a +2 status bonus to their saving throws against effects with that trait.

Effect: Raise Symbol.name: Effect: Raise Symbol
Effect: Raise Symbol.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.koER7gKf6CnW5O0s]{Raise Symbol}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saving throws until the start of your next turn. While it's raised, if you roll a success at a saving throw against a vitality or void effect, you get a critical success instead.

Effect: Rampaging Form.name: Effect: Rampaging Form
Effect: Rampaging Form.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Zl6vDXJEM7Lbp8JQ]{Rampaging Form}

You Change Shape into a form of living ice for 1 minute or until you shift back. Your battle form is Huge and has the following statistics:

  • AC = 18 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 20 temporary Hit Points.
  • Low-light vision and imprecise scent 30 feet.
  • A Speed of 30, a Fly speed of 40, and you don't need to breathe
  • Melee a jaws, Damage 2d8 piercing + 1d4 fire damage.
  • Your unarmed attacks deal 1d4 additional fire damage, and your fire spells deal one additional die of fire damage (of the same damage die the spell uses).
  • You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.O9w7r4BKgPogYDDe]{Produce Flame} as an innate spell; the casting is reduced from 2 actions to 1.
  • Any creature that touches you or damages you with an unarmed attack or non-reach melee weapon takes @Damage[3d6[fire]] damage.
  • Athletics modifier of +20, unless your own modifier is higher.

Effect: Rampaging Form (Frozen Winds Kit.name: Effect: Rampaging Form (Frozen Winds Kitsune)
Effect: Rampaging Form (Frozen Winds Kit.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Zl6vDXJEM7Lbp8JQ]{Rampaging Form}

You Change Shape into a form of living ice for 1 minute or until you shift back. Your battle form is Huge and has the following statistics:

  • AC = 18 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 20 temporary Hit Points.
  • Low-light vision and imprecise scent 30 feet.
  • A Speed of 30, a Fly speed of 40, and you don't need to breathe
  • Melee a jaws, Damage 2d8 piercing + 1d4 cold damage.
  • Your unarmed attacks deal 1d4 additional cold damage, and your cold spells deal one additional die of cold damage (of the same damage die the spell uses).
  • You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gYjPm7YwGtEa1oxh]{Ray of Frost} as an innate spell; the casting is reduced from 2 actions to 1.
  • Any creature that touches you or damages you with an unarmed attack or non-reach melee weapon takes @Damage[3d6[cold]] damage.
  • Athletics modifier of +20, unless your own modifier is higher.

Effect: Read Shibboleths.name: Effect: Read Shibboleths
Effect: Read Shibboleths.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Crd3qMecF9FYHjuH]{Read Shibboleths}

Once you've gleaned one or more true minor facts about a person, you can then incorporate these mannerisms into your speech to present yourself in a way that they find familiar. This grants you a +1 circumstance bonus to your Diplomacy and Deception checks with them.

Effect: Reckless Abandon (Goblin).name: Effect: Reckless Abandon (Goblin)
Effect: Reckless Abandon (Goblin).description: For the remainder of your turn, if you roll a failure or critical failure on a saving throw against a harmful effect, you get a success instead.

Effect: Reflexive Shield.name: Effect: Reflexive Shield
Effect: Reflexive Shield.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.dHUoQVzDa9Cf4QCG]{Reflexive Shield} when you raise a shield that gives a +2 circumstance bonus to AC.

You gain your shield's cricumstance bonus to Reflex saves.

Effect: Replenishment of War.name: Effect: Replenishment of War
Effect: Replenishment of War.description: You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to half your level, or equal to your level if the Strike was a critical hit. These temporary Hit Points last until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Resounding Bravery.name: Effect: Resounding Bravery
Effect: Resounding Bravery.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.dTO1ShJovbzrKUY4]{Resounding Bravery} if you critically succeed at a Will save against a foe's ability.

You gain a +1 status bonus to saves and a number of temporary Hit Points equal to half your level for 1 minute.

Effect: Resounding Bravery (vs. Fear).name: Effect: Resounding Bravery (vs. Fear)
Effect: Resounding Bravery (vs. Fear).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.dTO1ShJovbzrKUY4]{Resounding Bravery} if you critically succeed at a Will save against a foe's fear effect.

You gain a +2 status bonus to saves and a number of temporary Hit Points equal to your level for 1 minute.

Effect: Resounding Finale.name: Effect: Resounding Finale
Effect: Resounding Finale.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.lhSqWHXK1JShUabF]{Resounding Finale}

All allies that had been benefiting from the spell's effects gain sonic resistance against the triggering damage.

Effect: Restorative Strike.name: Effect: Restorative Strike
Effect: Restorative Strike.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xUlRLkWnfZ7reej6]{Restorative Strike}

Cast a 1-action @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{Harm} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} spell to heal yourself, expending the spell normally. It loses the manipulate trait when cast this way. Then make a melee Strike. If you make this Strike with your deity's favored weapon, you gain a +1 status bonus to the attack roll.

If the Strike hits, you can target a second willing creature to heal the same amount from the spell. This creature can be outside of the spell's range, provided it's adjacent to the enemy you hit.

Effect: Rugged Mentor Boon (PFS).name: Effect: Rugged Mentor Boon (PFS)
Effect: Rugged Mentor Boon (PFS).description:
Effect While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you provide important insights that keep your less experienced colleagues safe from harm. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase the Level Bump's modifier to saving throws to 2.

Normal A Level Bump increases a PC's saving throw modifiers by 1.

Special A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

Effect: Sanctify Armament.name: Effect: Sanctify Armament
Effect: Sanctify Armament.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xtXWw3cUnVB25XSV]{Sanctify Armament}

The weapon gains your holy or unholy trait. It also deals an additional 2d6 spirit damage to creatures of the opposed trait.

Effect: Saoc Astrology.name: Effect: Saoc Astrology
Effect: Saoc Astrology.description: This effect grants you the selected circumstance bonus or penalty to skill checks.

Effect: Scout's Warning.name: Effect: Scout's Warning
Effect: Scout's Warning.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Tpcq3Lk7qEOZ3LDP]{Scout's Warning}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your initiative roll.

Effect: Seedpod.name: Effect: Seedpod
Effect: Seedpod.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.dWGa6cFSVrASTEfd]{Seedpod}

On a critical hit, a seedpod bursts, issuing forth a tangle of vegetation that imposes a -10-foot circumstance penalty on the target's Speed for 1 round.

Effect: Selfish Shield.name: Effect: Selfish Shield
Effect: Selfish Shield.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.enQieRrITuEQZxx2]{Selfish Shield}

You gain resistance against the triggering damage equal to 2 + half your level, regardless of damage type.

Effect: Shadow Blood Magic.name: Effect: Shadow Blood Magic
Effect: Shadow Blood Magic.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.uoQOm41BVdSo6pAS]{Bloodline: Shadow}

Shadows grow deeper around you or one target, either granting a +1 status bonus to Stealth or imposing a -1 status penalty to Perception for 1 round.

Effect: Shadow Blood Magic (Stealth).name: Effect: Shadow Blood Magic (Stealth)
Effect: Shadow Blood Magic (Stealth).description: Shadows grow deeper around you or one target, granting a +1 status bonus to Stealth for 1 round.

Effect: Shared Avoidance.name: Effect: Shared Avoidance
Effect: Shared Avoidance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.wIJC00ODLq9WYc1m]{Shared Avoidance}

Allies within 20 feet of you who are rolling the same saving throw against the same hazard also gain a +2 circumstance bonus to their saving throws.

Effect: Shared Clarity.name: Effect: Shared Clarity
Effect: Shared Clarity.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ybrx1nsg5J0L8d3j]{Shared Clarity}

Allies within 15 feet of you who failed the same saving throw against the same mental effect can also spend their reactions to reroll the failed saving throw with a +2 circumstance bonus.

Effect: Shield Ally.name: Effect: Shield Ally
Effect: Shield Ally.description: The hardness of your equipped shield increases by 2.

Effect: Shield of Faith.name: Effect: Shield of Faith
Effect: Shield of Faith.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.w3qyriA1YnzXaas3]{Shield of Faith}

You gain a +1 status bonus to your AC.

Effect: Skillful Mentor Boon (PFS).name: Effect: Skillful Mentor Boon (PFS)
Effect: Skillful Mentor Boon (PFS).description:
Effect While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you provide vital advice to sharpen your newer colleagues' skills. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase the Level Bump's modifier to skill checks to 2.

Normal A Level Bump increases a PC's skill check modifiers by 1.

Special A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

Effect: Smite Good.name: Effect: Smite Good
Effect: Smite Good.description:
Granted by Smite Good.

Until the start of your next turn, your Strikes against that foe using the weapon your blade ally inhabits deal an extra 4 spirit damage if the target is holy, increasing to 6 if you have master proficiency with this weapon.

If the chosen enemy attacks you before the start of your next turn, the duration extends to the end of that enemy's next turn. If the enemy continues to attack you each turn, the duration continues to extend.

Effect: Sniping Duo Dedication.name: Effect: Sniping Duo Dedication
Effect: Sniping Duo Dedication.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.6PP57Aa5HmSr0qIZ]{Sniping Duo Dedication}.

Whenever you or your spotter successfully Strikes a target, the other member of your duo gains a +1 circumstance bonus per weapon damage die on the damage roll of their next Strike made against that target before the end of their next turn.

Effect: Spark Fist.name: Effect: Spark Fist
Effect: Spark Fist.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.BL2nLeClO30QoQGs]{Spark Fist}

Your fist loses the nonlethal trait and deals additional fire damage on a successful Strike.

Effect: Spell Parry.name: Effect: Spell Parry
Effect: Spell Parry.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.X9AkydrMdFwg7qIn]{Spell Parry}

You raise your guard, gaining a +1 circumstance bonus to AC and to saving throws against spells that target you.

Effect: Spell Protection Array.name: Effect: Spell Protection Array
Effect: Spell Protection Array.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.3CPKbiweBRzXAJA9]{Spell Protection Array}

You gain a +1 status bonus to saving throws against magic.

0.label: Striking Retribution (vs. alghollthu and their servants) if alghollthu enchants ally

Effect: Tactical Debilitations (No Flank.name: Effect: Tactical Debilitations (No Flanking)
Effect: Tactical Debilitations (No Flank.description: The target can't flank or contribute to allies' flanking.

Effect: Terrain Attunement (Aquatic).name: Effect: Terrain Attunement (Aquatic)
Effect: Terrain Attunement (Aquatic).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.E8SDesgMD6Zbye2j]{Geomancer Dedication}

You gain a swim Speed equal to your land Speed.

Effect: Terrain Attunement (Arctic).name: Effect: Terrain Attunement (Arctic)
Effect: Terrain Attunement (Arctic).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.E8SDesgMD6Zbye2j]{Geomancer Dedication}

Enemies take a -5-foot status penalty to their Speeds (-10-foot on a critical failure).

Effect: Terrain Attunement (Mountain).name: Effect: Terrain Attunement (Mountain)
Effect: Terrain Attunement (Mountain).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.E8SDesgMD6Zbye2j]{Geomancer Dedication}

You gain resistance to physical damage (except adamantine) equal to the spell rank.

Effect: Terrain Attunement (Plains).name: Effect: Terrain Attunement (Plains)
Effect: Terrain Attunement (Plains).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.E8SDesgMD6Zbye2j]{Geomancer Dedication}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to the spell rank.

Effect: Terrain Attunement (Underground).name: Effect: Terrain Attunement (Underground)
Effect: Terrain Attunement (Underground).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.E8SDesgMD6Zbye2j]{Geomancer Dedication}

You gain darkvision as well as imprecise tremorsense out to 15 feet.

Effect: Terrain Shield.name: Effect: Terrain Shield
Effect: Terrain Shield.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.TNRB8IY6Wtk9BoMp]{Terrain Shield}

You gain resistance to physical damage equal to double your level against the triggering Strike.

Effect: Tidal Shield.name: Effect: Tidal Shield
Effect: Tidal Shield.description: You conjure the force of the tides to gain a +4 circumstance bonus to AC until the end of your next turn. You can Sustain the effect to a maximum duration of 5 rounds.

Effect: Topple Giants.name: Effect: Topple Giants
Effect: Topple Giants.description: When an ally within your overwatch field attempts to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip} an opponent within your overwatch field and fails, you coordinate efforts to provide a +2 circumstance bonus to the next Athletics check rolled by a different ally to attempt the same action on the same target before that target's next turn.

Effect: Treat Wounds Immunity.name: Effect: Treat Wounds Immunity
Effect: Treat Wounds Immunity.description: Granted when someone uses @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1kGNdIIhuglAjIp9]{Treat Wounds} on you, rendering you temporarily immune to Treat Wounds for the duration.

Effect: Twin Parry.name: Effect: Twin Parry
Effect: Twin Parry.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Y8LHfkzGyOhPlUou]{Twin Parry} if neither weapon has the parry trait.

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Twin Parry (Parry Trait).name: Effect: Twin Parry (Parry Trait)
Effect: Twin Parry (Parry Trait).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Y8LHfkzGyOhPlUou]{Twin Parry} if either weapon has the parry trait.

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Underground Endemic Herbs.name: Effect: Underground Endemic Herbs
Effect: Underground Endemic Herbs.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.BQzExsEZrwGsJD66]{Endemic Herbs}

Gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Perception.

Effect: Undying Ferocity.name: Effect: Undying Ferocity
Effect: Undying Ferocity.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.zZOycr00XDVTKuXa]{Undying Ferocity}

When you use Orc Ferocity, you gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level.

Effect: Unstable Check Failure.name: Effect: Unstable Check Failure
Effect: Unstable Check Failure.description: On a failure, the innovation malfunctions in a spectacular (though harmless) fashion, such as a belch of smoke or shower of sparks, and it becomes incapable of being used for further unstable actions.

Effect: Vicious Debilitations.name: Effect: Vicious Debilitations
Effect: Vicious Debilitations.description: The target gains weakness 5 to your choice of bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage.

Effect: Victorious Vigor.name: Effect: Victorious Vigor
Effect: Victorious Vigor.description: You gain temporary Hit Points equal to your Constitution modifier until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Vigorous Anthem.name: Effect: Vigorous Anthem
Effect: Vigorous Anthem.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.4SKech3n0F38HrR5]{Vigorous Anthem}

You gain temporary HP equal to 3 + the source's Charisma modifier.

Effect: Watch Your Back.name: Effect: Watch Your Back
Effect: Watch Your Back.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.zZCyJhsaugHB6mZW]{Watch Your Back}

The target gains a +2 status bonus to Perception checks against you, but it takes a –2 status penalty to Will saves against fear effects.

Effect: Weapon Tampered With (Critical S.name: Effect: Weapon Tampered With (Critical Success)
Effect: Weapon Tampered With (Critical S.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.SheifYobjKqyK3Fv]{Tamper}

Your weapon has been tampered with! You take a -2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls and damage rolls with that weapon. The effect lasts until you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} to remove it.

Effect: Weapon Tampered With (Success).name: Effect: Weapon Tampered With (Success)
Effect: Weapon Tampered With (Success).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.SheifYobjKqyK3Fv]{Tamper}

Your weapon has been tampered with! You take a -2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls and damage rolls with that weapon. The effect ends at the start of the inventor's next turn, or until you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} to remove it.

Effect: Wings of Air.name: Effect: Wings of Air
Effect: Wings of Air.description: You can strain to call forth feathered or cloudy wings from your back. Once manifested, these wings remain for 10 minutes. You gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed while you've manifested your wings.

Effect: Wish for Luck.name: Effect: Wish for Luck
Effect: Wish for Luck.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.N6U02s9qJKQIvmQd]{Wish for Luck}

Roll the attack roll, saving throw, or skill check twice and take the higher result.

Effect: Witch's Charge.name: Effect: Witch's Charge
Effect: Witch's Charge.description: Granted when you designate someone as your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.52QyoGaysrfBOy5H]{Witch's Charge}.

Effect: Worldly Mentor Boon (PFS).name: Effect: Worldly Mentor Boon (PFS)
Effect: Worldly Mentor Boon (PFS).description:
Effect While working with less experienced Pathfinder allies, you help your less experienced colleagues recognize danger and withstand danger. For any PCs benefiting from a Level Bump and whose levels are lower than yours, you increase the Level Bump's modifier to Perception checks and Initiative rolls to 2.

Normal A Level Bump increases a PC's Perception modifier by 1.

Special A PC can only benefit from two mentor boons.

Stance: Arcane Cascade.name: Stance: Arcane Cascade
Stance: Arcane Cascade.description:
Requirements You used your most recent action this turn to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast a Spell} or make a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.QDW9H8XLIjuW2fE4]{Spellstrike}. You need to meet this requirement only to enter the stance, not to remain in it.

You divert a portion of the spell's magical power and keep it cycling through your body and weapon using specialized forms, breathing, or footwork. While you're in the stance, your melee Strikes deal 1 extra force damage. This damage increases to 2 if you have weapon specialization and 3 if you have greater weapon specialization. Any Strike that benefits from this damage gains the arcane trait, making it magical.

If your most recent spell before entering the stance was one that can deal damage, the damage from the stance is instead the same type that spell could deal (or one type of your choice if the spell could deal multiple types of damage).

Stance: Bullet Dancer Stance.name: Stance: Bullet Dancer Stance
Stance: Bullet Dancer Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SMF1hTWPHtmlS8Cd]{Bullet Dancer Stance}

Requirements You're unarmored and wielding a simple firearm, bayonet, or reinforced stock

Effect You enter a specialized stance for a unique martial art centered around the use of simple firearms. While in this stance, the only Strikes you can make are those using bayonets, reinforced stocks, and simple firearms. You can use Flurry of Blows with these weapons. You can use your other monk feats or monk abilities that normally require unarmed attacks with bayonets and reinforced stocks, so long as the feat or ability doesn't require a single, specific Strike. You can also use them with simple firearms when attacking within half the first range increment.

Stance: Cobra Stance (Cobra Envenom).name: Stance: Cobra Stance (Cobra Envenom)
Stance: Cobra Stance (Cobra Envenom).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.AkV4Jyllo6nlK2Sl]{Cobra Stance} if you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xQuNswWB3eg1UM28]{Cobra Envenom}, which increases the circumstance bonus to Fortitude saves and Fortitude DC to +2.

You enter a tight stance, coiled up like a lashing cobra with your hands poised as venomous fangs. While in this stance, the only Strikes you can make are cobra fang unarmed attacks. These deal 1d4 poison damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, deadly d10, finesse, nonlethal, poison, and unarmed traits.

While in Cobra Stance, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Fortitude saves and your Fortitude DC, and you gain poison resistance equal to half your level.

Stance: Disarming Stance.name: Stance: Disarming Stance
Stance: Disarming Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.1p5ErCp33nGOzEsk]{Disarming Stance}.

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks to Disarm and a +2 circumstance bonus to your Reflex DC when defending against checks to Disarm you.

Stance: Disruptive Stance.name: Stance: Disruptive Stance
Stance: Disruptive Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.OEGhbRgW6wRbccns]{Disruptive Stance}

The slightest distraction can provoke your wrath, and you're prepared to foil enemies' actions.

As long as you are in this stance, you can use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.KAVf7AmRnbCAHrkT]{Reactive Strike} when a creature within your reach uses a concentrate action, in addition to manipulate and move actions.

Furthermore, you disrupt a triggering concentrate or manipulate action if your Strike hits (not only if it's a critical hit).

Stance: Everstand Stance.name: Stance: Everstand Stance
Stance: Everstand Stance.description: When in this stance, you wield the shield with both hands. When wielding a shield this way, increase the weapon damage die of the shield's boss or spikes by one step, and increase the shield's Hardness by 2 when using the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{Shield Block} reaction.

Stance: Fane's Fourberie.name: Stance: Fane's Fourberie
Stance: Fane's Fourberie.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.80CEAB05TP5ki9iW]{Fane's Fourberie}

Stella Fane has perfected a technique for using playing cards as weapons that's one part sleight of hand and one part magic.

When you enter this stance, choose whether to treat playing cards in your possession as daggers or darts; you can wield a playing card in all ways as the chosen weapon until the stance ends. As long as the majority of the deck remains in your possession, any cards that are lost or thrown can be found after 1 minute. Otherwise, the remaining cards are likely lost or destroyed.

A character who has this feat can enchant a single deck of playing cards as a magic weapon, etching fundamental and property runes directly onto the deck of cards.

Stance: Gorilla Stance.name: Stance: Gorilla Stance
Stance: Gorilla Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.DqD7htz8Sd1dh3BT]{Gorilla Stance}

You lower yourself to the ground and take an imposing, knuckle-walking stance. While in this stance, the only Strikes you can make are gorilla slam unarmed attacks. These deal 1d8 bludgeoning damage; are in the brawling group; and have the backswing, forceful, grapple, nonlethal, and unarmed traits.

While you are in Gorilla Stance, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{Climb}, and if you roll a success on an Athletics check to Climb, you get a critical success instead.

2.text: If you roll a success on an Athletics check to Climb, you get a critical success instead.

Stance: Gorilla Stance (Gorilla Pound).name: Stance: Gorilla Stance (Gorilla Pound)
Stance: Gorilla Stance (Gorilla Pound).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.DqD7htz8Sd1dh3BT]{Gorilla Stance} if you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.nRjyyDulHnP5OewA]{Gorilla Pound}, which grants you a climb speed of 15 while you are in this stance.

You lower yourself to the ground and take an imposing, knuckle-walking stance. While in this stance, the only Strikes you can make are gorilla slam unarmed attacks. These deal 1d8 bludgeoning damage; are in the brawling group; and have the backswing, forceful, grapple, nonlethal, and unarmed traits.

While you are in Gorilla Stance, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{Climb}, and if you roll a success on an Athletics check to Climb, you get a critical success instead.

2.text: If you roll a success on an Athletics check to Climb, you get a critical success instead.

Stance: Graceful Poise.name: Stance: Graceful Poise
Stance: Graceful Poise.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.rFaUJtB46scuAidY]{Graceful Poise}

With the right positioning, your off-hand weapon can strike like a scorpion's stinger.

While you are in this stance, if you make your second Strike from @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.onde0SxLoxLBTnvm]{Double Slice} with an agile weapon, Double Slice counts as one attack when calculating your multiple attack penalty.

Stance: Impassable Wall Stance.name: Stance: Impassable Wall Stance
Stance: Impassable Wall Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.YeyOqNFKaeuOTiJr]{Impassable Wall Stance}

You refuse to let foes past your guard. As long as you are in this stance, when you critically hit with an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.KAVf7AmRnbCAHrkT]{Reactive Strike} triggered by a move action, you disrupt that move action.

Stance: Lunging Stance.name: Stance: Lunging Stance
Stance: Lunging Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ZghzLmYgeE19GqjP]{Lunging Stance}

While you are in this stance, you can use Reactive Strike against a creature that is outside your reach but within the reach you would have with a Lunge. If you do, you increase your range with the Strike by 5 feet.

Stance: Mobile Shot Stance.name: Stance: Mobile Shot Stance
Stance: Mobile Shot Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.rByA8NDI6ZtNgBeT]{Mobile Shot Stance}

Your shots become nimble and deadly. While you're in this stance, your ranged Strikes don't trigger Attacks of Opportunity or other reactions that are triggered by a ranged attack.

If you have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.KAVf7AmRnbCAHrkT]{Reactive Strike}, you can use it with a loaded ranged weapon you're wielding. The triggering creature must be within 5 feet of you for you to do so.

Stance: Multishot Stance.name: Stance: Multishot Stance
Stance: Multishot Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.RzhnxgiAopWILCvs]{Multishot Stance}.

While you are in this stance, your penalty for Double Shot is reduced to -1, or -2 if you add the extra action to make three Strikes. If you move from your position, this stance ends.

Stance: Paragon's Guard.name: Stance: Paragon's Guard
Stance: Paragon's Guard.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.hPDerDCYmag3s0dP]{Paragon's Guard}.

Requirements You are wielding a shield

Once you've had a moment to set your stance, you always have your shield ready without a thought.

While you are in this stance, you constantly have your shield raised as if you'd used the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.xjGwis0uaC2305pm]{Raise a Shield} action, as long as you meet that action's requirements.

Stance: Peafowl Stance.name: Stance: Peafowl Stance
Stance: Peafowl Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.C3MgEkPNaIhTddbr]{Peafowl Stance}

You enter a tall and proud stance while remaining mobile, with all the grace and composure of a peafowl.

While in this stance, the only Strikes you can make are melee Strikes with the required sword. Once per round, after you hit with a monk sword Strike, you can Step as a free action as your next action.

Stance: Point Blank Stance.name: Stance: Point Blank Stance
Stance: Point Blank Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Yl2wYv24v5kw95aS]{Point-Blank Shot}.

When using a ranged weapon that doesn't have the volley trait, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to damage rolls on attacks against targets within the weapon's first range increment.

Stance: Rain of Embers Stance.name: Stance: Rain of Embers Stance
Stance: Rain of Embers Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.rbiMK71SvGZGRLJ1]{Rain of Embers Stance}

You enter the stance of an enraged phoenix, holding your fingers as rigid as deadly talons while moving with quick, flickering gestures that dance with biting flames. The only Strikes you can make are fire talon Strikes. These deal 1d4 fire damage; are in the brawling group; and have the agile, finesse, fire, nonlethal, and unarmed traits.

While in Rain of Embers Stance, you gain a +1 status bonus to AC and fire resistance equal to half your level (minimum 1).

Stance: Reflective Ripple Stance.name: Stance: Reflective Ripple Stance
Stance: Reflective Ripple Stance.description:
You can make flowing wave attacks that deal 1d6 bludgeoning damage. They are in the brawling group and have the agile, disarm, finesse, nonlethal, trip, unarmed, and water traits.

While in Reflective Ripple Stance, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.c8TGiZ48ygoSPofx]{Swim}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip}, and you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your Reflex DC to avoid being Disarmed and Tripped.

Stance: Ricochet Stance.name: Stance: Ricochet Stance
Stance: Ricochet Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.tRHjUCl0xqG97nok]{Ricochet Stance (Fighter)} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.RsNvCSrCN7czHC0G]{Ricochet Stance (Rogue)}

You adopt a stance designed to rebound your thrown weapons back toward you. While you are in this stance, any thrown weapons you use as part of a ranged Strike to deal bludgeoning or slashing damage immediately return to your hand, enabling you to use them for additional Strikes.

You must be within the weapon's listed range increment and have a hand free to catch the weapon. If you make a ranged Strike with a thrown weapon outside of its listed range increment, it instead flies back toward you a number of feet equal to its listed range increment and then falls to the ground.

Stance: Rough Terrain Stance.name: Stance: Rough Terrain Stance
Stance: Rough Terrain Stance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.O0POcPD2aELYTcIK]{Rough Terrain Stance}

Requirements You gained a terrain attunement benefit this turn.

You enter a stance that makes it difficult to move around you. Each square adjacent to you becomes difficult terrain that matches the terrain attunement you gained (rime forms in an arctic terrain, momentary undergrowth shoots up in a forest terrain, and so on). You ignore this difficult terrain.

This stance ends if you move into a different type of terrain.

Stance: Stoked Flame Stance.name: Stance: Stoked Flame Stance
Stance: Stoked Flame Stance.description:
Requirements You're unarmored.

You enter a stance of fast, fiery movements. You can make flashing spark attacks that deal 1d8 slashing damage. They are in the brawling group and have the forceful, nonlethal, sweep, and unarmed traits. If you have access to the flashing sparks' critical specialization effect, you can take an alternate effect instead: if your critical Strike dealt damage, the target takes 1d6 persistent fire damage.

While in Stoked Flame Stance, you gain a +5-foot status bonus to your Speed. If you have incredible movement, increase the benefit from incredible movement to a +15-foot status bonus plus 5 feet for every 4 levels beyond 3rd.

Special This feat gains your choice of either the divine or occult trait, matching your ki spell tradition if possible.

0.text: If you have access to the flashing sparks' critical specialization effect, you can take an alternate effect instead: if your critical Strike dealt damage, the target takes @Damage[1d6[persistent,fire]] damage.

Stance: Twinned Defense.name: Stance: Twinned Defense
Stance: Twinned Defense.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.xjLbabfyQzBNT4y1]{Twinned Defense (Fighter)} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.kTRGAST9J9ZxJZ4A]{Twinned Defense (Swashbuckler)}

Requirements You are wielding two melee weapons, one in each hand

You're always ready to use your off-hand weapon to interfere with attacks against you. While you are in this stance, you constantly gain the benefits of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Y8LHfkzGyOhPlUou]{Twin Parry} action.
